title: Courtyard by Marriott  opens a new property in Gorakhpur
description: Marriott International said the 97 rooms hotel is located in Gorakhpurâ€™s city center and a 30-minutes drive away from Mahayogi Gorakhnath Airport. The chain said the hotel is 'well-connected' to the Gorakhpur Junction Railway Station and The Gorakhpur Bus Stand, and has views of Ramgarh Tal Lake in the backdrop.
